dmca.title: jmcompugradellc.com is in violation of the Digital Millennium Act of 1998
dmca.body:
This is rather unprofessional and rude. 

 

First you stole the content of my website (word for word) and you have the nerve to send a rude reply to me.

 

I shall be filing a formal complaint (which will remove your website from all search engines) immediately.

 

I have given you sufficent time to remove the STOLEN CONTENT FROM www.cybertime.ca and you have refused.

 

CyberTime Communications

jmcompu_usa <jmcompu_usa@yahoo.com> wrote: 
You need prove that we stole something, in this country is on the law if you said that someone stole something with out prove.

So stop sending stupid e-mail, and do something better, I got a lot work to do to get attention what you saying
